memberdef.argsstring: (void *error, int code, const char *function, const char *descr,...)
memberdef.name: _ssh_set_error

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the error text message from the last error.

simplesect.para: A static string describing the error.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the error code from the last error.

simplesect.para: SSH_NO_ERROR No error occurred SSH_REQUEST_DENIED The last request was denied but situation is recoverable SSH_FATAL A fatal error occurred. This could be an unexpected disconnection Other error codes are internal but can be considered same than SSH_FATAL.
